articles.author: Paul Cullen
articles.title: Ireland only one of two European countries where drinking did not fall during pandemic - The Irish Times
articles.description: Two countries stand out as ‘notable anomalies’, Covid-19 survey finds
articles.content:
Ireland is one of only two countries in Europe where alcohol consumption did not decline during the first wave of the Covid-19 pandemic, according to new research.
There were significant decreases i… [+2417 chars]

articles.title: Biden Set To Announce Vaccine Giveaway To Countries In Need : Goats and Soda - NPR
articles.description: On the first European trip of his presidency, Biden will announce a major U.S. contribution to the global vaccine effort — part of an effort to end COVID-19 "everywhere."

articles.title: 'No longer illegal to holiday': Vaccine passports passed by European Parliament - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: The cert, due to be introduced in Ireland on July 19th, will show if a passenger has been vaccinated, tested negative for Covid, or has recovered from the virus
articles.content:
